snippet: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz.
abstract: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz.
lead_paragraph: GREENBURGH, N.Y. - The Knicks announced Tuesday that Carmelo Anthony would miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in Monday's victory over the Utah Jazz.

headline.main: Anthony Out One to Two Weeks
